channel.title: story on Ruben Krueger
channel.description: Recent content in story on Ruben Krueger

item.title: Work that matters
item.description: Two men were sitting at the bar after work, as men do. The first man, Larry the Lawyer, was bemoaning his day. “Oh, how much of the legal profession is drudgery,” he said. “I spend hours of my day filing useless motions then spend even more time in court on behalf of clients who commit the most heinous acts,” he continued. The other man, Barry Bottle Cap, nodded and sipped his beer.
